SELECT wci.id, wci.customer_code, wci.customer_name, wci.customer_type_id, (SELECT sd.dict_name FROM sys_dict sd WHERE sd.is_deleted=0 and sd.dict_type = "clientType" AND sd.id = wci.customer_type_id) AS customerTypeDetails, wci.user_name, wci.phone_number, wci.email, wci.address, wci.status, case when wci.status = 1 then '是' when wci.status = 0 then '否' end as statusDetails, wci.remark, wci.is_deleted, wci.create_by, wci.create_time, wci.update_by, wci.update_time FROM wms_customer_info wci WHERE is_deleted = 0
and wci.customer_code like CONCAT('%',#{wmsCustomerInfo.customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
and wci.customer_code =#{wmsCustomerInfo.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY wci.create_time desc
